name: Moon Landing Simulator (Unique Lunar Lander)
description:
Welcome to Moon Landing Simulator. Here you will execute your mission to fly from platform to platform on the moon. There is no way to win, so just have fun and try to get your high score. Post your score in the comments and compete with each other: OFFLINE!

Please remember that on the moon, there is only one rule:

HAVE FUN!

Directions and controls are in game. Please take time to read everything!
